column2: Create a Motto that will be remembered alone with your House

Semper Verum|Fidelitate Coniuncti|Nullius in verba|Natus ad magna gerenda|Suaviter in Modo, Fortiter in Re|Cede Nullius|Fortius quo fidelius|Consilio et Animis|Vis Unita Fortior|Consectatio Excellentiae|Audere est Facere|Nihil Sine Deo|Concordia, Integritas, Industria|Pietate, Arte et Scientia Corrigere|Super Ardua|Hereditas Domini filii|Fidelus Paradus|Semper Fidelis
Ex luna, scientia|Per Ardua Ad Astra
Allah Akbar, Wa Lellah Al Hamd|Alkhalqa, Al'aymanu, Alqua
Good Thoughts, Good Words, Good Deeds
Truth alone triumphs|Peace comes from within|Nothing is permanent|A disciplined mind brings happiness
NOT have house motto created, nor recently removed a house motto
You hand over the decision right.

A good motto give prominence to the essence of a house, so I must choose with caution. Among so many proposals I feeling these two might have the chance to suit my house, but I'm not sure which one is destined...
Go ask my wife [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] for helping
Go Consulting with my regent, the person I can count on
Hmpf! All craps, I'm gonna write a masterpiece motto.
